open_positions.thesis: Gap-up market at 2nd extension zone. Bearish + breadth divergence + FOMC catalyst. Testing framework repeatability with tighter risk ($100 vs $200 on Trade #6).
open_positions.notes: Framework validation trade #2. Trade #6 exited cleanly per Rule #19 at small loss. Trade #7 tests if framework repeats same day.

closed_positions.rule_compliance: 0/3 rules followed - Entered without C+R confirmation, EMA filter check, or ADD confirmation. Blindly followed external advice (Chris from Simpler Trading 9-day EMA mean reversion call) without running threat assessment.
closed_positions.notes: LESSON: Never enter on external tip without verifying against OUR rules. Skipped entire rule checklist because of conviction in advisor recommendation. Small loss (tiny %) but rule violation clear. Extract: Only trade when ALL confluence criteria met, not because someone else said so.

closed_positions.thesis: Gap-up reversion at extension zone. 7 independent confluences (bearish divergence, breadth divergence, AAPL double-top, NVDA rejection, SPX resistance, FOMC catalyst, VWAP trigger).
closed_positions.notes: Framework validation trade #1. Thesis triggered correctly but SPY continued higher. Exited per Rule #19 (3-candle hold) preventing larger loss. Learned: Framework has merit, need tighter confluence or better timing.

notes: Position tracking - open positions monitored in real-time, closed positions logged with rule compliance notes for learning and framework validation.
